ModMetaData.name: RimVore - 2Bulges
ModMetaData.author: Rutrix
ModMetaData.description:
Adds some belly visuals to a wide variety of humanoid pawns, using the Humanoid Alien Races body addon system.

Supports:
 Humans
 AA's Redwall Races
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2732768527

 Anthro Race
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2455173560

 Kobolds of the Rim
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2569480318

 Pawnbolds
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2104039874

 Cutebolds
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2147295726
 AA's Dogbolds
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2436521813

 AA's Foxbolds
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2438217201

 The Eastern Dragons (Continued)
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2672488311

 Irken
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2848138140

 Snakes
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2677486831

 Klickmala
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2489566199

 Frosty Dragons
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2488920026

 Lucario and Riolu Race
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2856803587

 Protogen! Marley Race Mod
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1716136868

 Avali Race Mod (retexture used)
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2668670571

 Chiropterans of RimWorld
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2577222782

 TP's Vessels
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2334539395

 Outland Motz
 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2839780788

 Sylveon
 https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2800815182

 Vaporeon
 https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2900807338

 Braixen and Delphox
 https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2424930825


 Also includes support for a Slugcat race, which seems to be taken down; included in the zip for those interested (they're op af).


 Also includes a patch to allow all races to wear the Foxbold's sandcloak; it's the best shell-layer wear for this sort of thing ;)

 Future plans to have bulged apperel as well; right now, just the clothing for TP's Vessels have this functionality.



 If any mod authors deem their race's inclusion in this problematic, let me know and I'll cut support. If there's a race you'd like support for, let me know. If you're better at art than me (you are), feel free to resprite. If you can find that slugcat race, let me know, it's really bugging me.
